GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.15.51
GSD.description:
xsk: Fix generic transmit when completion queue reservation fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.51 by commit 64e6ba7f2d2f022469be6c2a1c179851b94842dc, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit 675716400da6f15b9d3db04ef74ee74ca9a00af3. For more details please see the references link.
